source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenery shot of a street corner, with the camera appearing stationary or moving very slowly.

The scene is captured at dusk or on an overcast day. A red SUV is parked on the right side of the frame, next to a crosswalk and a traffic pole. In the background, trees line the street, including one with vibrant pink blossoms. Streetlights are illuminated.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
combine to only one paragraph

the camera moves forward while panning from right to left with noticeable, unsteady shaking.

The scene is captured at dusk or dawn, under a bright (not overcast)day. 

In the background, trees line the street, but the one with vibrant pink blossoms is in the midground.

The scene is captured at either dusk or dawn, under a bright day rather than an overcast one. In the background, trees line the street, with the tree featuring vibrant pink blossoms positioned in the midground.

source_caption_data.final_caption: This video captures a street corner scene at either dusk or dawn, under a bright day. The camera moves forward while panning from right to left, exhibiting noticeable, unsteady shaking. A red SUV is parked on the right side of the frame, next to a crosswalk and a traffic pole. generated_critique: The caption contains a factual contradiction by stating the scene is "at either dusk or dawn, under a bright day." The phrase "under a bright day" should be removed. The use of "either...or" is also speculative, which the instructions advise against. It would be better to describe the observable conditions, such as "under an overcast sky with illuminated streetlights." Most importantly, the caption fails to describe all the motion present. While it correctly identifies the camera's movement, it completely omits the white car that drives from right to left through the intersection in the background. This motion should be added to the description in chronological order.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a view from a street corner, with the camera appearing stationary or moving very slowly. The scene is captured under an overcast sky. In the background, a white car drives through an intersection from right to left. A red SUV is parked on the right side of the frame, next to a crosswalk and a traffic pole. Trees line the street in the background, including one with vibrant pink blossoms, and streetlights are illuminated.
